definitions.text: everything that is included in a collection and that is held or included in something
examples: he emptied the contents of his pockets
the two groups were similar in content

definitions.text: what a communication that is about something is about
the proportion of a substance that is contained in a mixture or alloy etc.
the amount that can be contained
examples: the gas tank has a capacity of 12 gallons

definitions.text: the sum or range of what has been perceived, discovered, or learned
the state of being contented with your situation in life
examples: they could read to their heart's content

definitions.text: something (a person or object or scene) selected by an artist or photographer for graphic representation
examples: a moving picture of a train is more dramatic than a still picture of the same subject
He contented himself with one glass of beer per day

definitions.text: satisfied or showing satisfaction with things as they are
